name: Hilton Pleasanton at The Club

reviews.text: I was very indefferent about this hilton. My room was fine but the noise from the freeway was a little much. Staff was nice and housekeeping did a great job. The hotel's location is fine, although it was very hard to find the first time. I'll probably stay here again.
reviews.title: Fine hotel
Good Enough
reviews.text: I stayed 5 nights at the Hilton. It was clean and orderly. I did not stay on the side closest to the Freeway, so I cannot comment on the noise level. Food was acceptable.

aka: Hilton Pleasanton At The Club Hotel Pleasanton
description: Visit Pleasanton, a cozy stop in Northern California with small town flavor and big city connections, and stay at the Hilton Pleasanton at The Club hotel. This town is known for big fun and big business, and with quick access to I-580 and I-680, you'll have no trouble discovering both. The hotel is located just minutes from the Hacienda and Bishop Ranch Business Parks, Livermore Valley Wine Country, Alameda County Fairgrounds, and historic downtown.
